title: Google inconsistently removes last ‘Updated on’ information from Play Store again
content:
Back in November, Google removed the last “Updated on” section from Play Store app listings on Android to everyone’s annoyance. That change was reversed at the time, but it now appears to be gone again.

more…

The post Google inconsistently removes last ‘Updated on’ information from Play Store again  appeared first on 9to5Google.
